text: 58|12|He muminasakala! Tomaloke yetiya raachulara saite akalasaraiyakai katha kaâ€™ba bicaraa, tetiya tomaloke ene katha koraara agate kiba chadakba peca karaa, e'itorae tomalokara babe sraeya arau paraisodhaka; kintu yadi tomaloke saksama nohoraa tente niscaya allaha parama ksamasila, ati dayalu.
